extendedInfo.description: Thanks to Dolphin Browser Beta's canvas rendering, itâs the most sophisticated HTML5 rendering browser available and itâs Flash compatible.Dolphin Browser Beta is the highest performing HTML5 rendering browser available today.  Dolphin Browser Beta (with Dolphin Engine) is an improved webkit version with extensive canvas rendering enhancements and behind-the-scenes technology that makes it our fastest Dolphin yet.*Important:To use Dolphin Browser Beta, you will need an OS of Android 2.3 or 4.0+ and an processor of ARM7+Full list of Engine tested devices: http://dolphin-browser.com/full-list-of-tested-devices/How fast? Dolphin Browser Beta's HTML-5 rendering is:â¢ 5 - 10X faster than the default Flash Android browserâ¢ 100% faster than Chrome (at times)â¢ Initially scored over 450 when tested on HTML5test.com. (HTML5test.com is an industry respected tool for testing a browserâs support of HTML5)With a score of over 450, the highest tested, Dolphin has:â¢ Full support for Web Workerâ¢ Full support for Web Socketâ¢ Full support for Web Audioâ¢ Support of Camera real-time video displayâ¢ Support of Web Notificationâ¢ Support of Web GLâ¢ Support of Web application customizationBesides HTML5 rendering enhancements, Dolphin Browser Beta includes all the features in Dolphin Browser (Formerly Dolphin Browser HD):â Sonar â Dolphin listens and lets you use your voice to search on the Internet, share on your favorite social networks, bookmark your favorite website, navigate and more.â Gesture - Let your inner artist out and create a personal Gesture (symbol) to access the mobile and desktop websites you use the most.â Webzine - Fast Web page loading, with no ads. Dolphin Webzine simplifies the way you read your favorite mobile content, from news to blogs and websites. Webzine is now available as an Add-on on the Android Market.â Speed Dial - Visit your favorite mobile and desktop websites on the go with one touch.â Tabbed browsing - No need to toggle between screens, tabbed browsing lets you open and switch between Web pages fast as lightning.â Sidebars - Make the best of mobile interface via Dolphin Sidebar.We love hearing from you. Contact us at support@dolphin-browser.com and rate us today!Website: www.dolphin-browser.com Join Dolphin Facebook Fan page: http://www.facebook.com/DolphinFans Follow Dolphin on Twitter: https://twitter.com/#!/DolphinBrowser

reviews.title: Excellent work
reviews.comment: I download the official one and I compare it with this one (beta) And the result is that: Faster, stable, easy-to-use And it\'s the fastest and the most functional browser for android
reviews.author: Mahmoud Odeh

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Works great...no bugs No laggs simply smooth Love it!!!!!!
reviews.author: vamsi raj

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: I used the much claimed UC Brower earlier but it crashes frequently and takes long time to load even google home page. Later in a search for better browser I installed Dolphin. Boss, this works great with awesome speed. Go for this if you want best android broswer on earth. Other just claim, but Dolphin does!!!
reviews.author: Shinoj Kumar

reviews.title: FIRST IMPRESSIONS!!
reviews.comment: Just downloaded the app, and I\'m already getting a good feeling about it. It\'s definitely a clean interface and seems like it will be easy to use. However, haven\'t gotten to play around with it enough yet. At least not to give it a proper rating. \342\230\205WILL UPDATE!\342\230\205
reviews.author: Nicholas Oswald

reviews.title: Sony Xperia Miro
reviews.comment: The best android browser. I had previously used opera mobile browser and firefox beta browser but after installing this, I uninstalled all other browsers. Simply speaking this is the best browser of all.
reviews.author: Shrey Kaushik

reviews.title: Wonderful browser
reviews.comment: It is a best browser when compared to uc and all others.. Extensions are very useful and looking smart and pretty cute
reviews.author: imran basha

reviews.title: No update in forever...
reviews.comment: I can\'t stand the magnifier always popping up when I tap on the screen. Can I have the option to turn that off? When I pinch to zoom in on what I\'m trying to read it zooms and scrolls all over the place except where I want it to.
reviews.author: Jessica Kelley

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: Hands down best browser for 4.2.2.  Flash support is flawless.  Smooth and fast.  Uninstalled f!refox.  Better than chrome. My new everything browser.
reviews.author: m tompkins

reviews.title: NO FLASH!!! MISLEADING!!!
reviews.comment: I downloaded because it says it supports flash. It does not. When u go to turn on flash, it says they turned it off. Uninstalling. I have no other use for this app.
reviews.author: Casey B.

reviews.title: Galaxy S3 mini
reviews.comment: Fast, Smooth, with no lag at all. This is my default Browser over one month, and it`s better than stock (I thought I would never say that). Try it and you`ll see. Ps. For Developer: Don`t change anything because it works perfect!! Cheers
reviews.author: Bane Mihajlovic

reviews.title: Pretty good
reviews.comment: Pretty good browser, but if you long press on a link on some sites (Tumblr being one of them) it doesn\'t give the option of opening in a new tab. Better than all the others I\'ve tried though.
reviews.author: Anton Allen

reviews.title: Best browser available
reviews.comment: The browser is just best nd pretty fast. It loads pages quickly and has powerful download manager.
reviews.author: abhishek uniyal

reviews.title: One bug
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t display HTML5 custom fonts in non-english languages (Specific languages, only found in Thai). Second, I\'m not be able to go back to the previous page in the same tab, and may not  change the order of tabs in the browser. UPDATE: Now dropped down to 2 stars now. If I find more bugs again, Dropped down into 1 star, or maybe 0 stars.
reviews.author: Phongpanot Phairatwetchaphan

reviews.title: Great Browser
reviews.comment: I love the look and feel of this browser. The screen output is crisp and fast. The \"Sonar\" addition is fantastic. Only issue I have is that when I pinch zoom I start getting this screen flash that resets the screen to the top of whatever page I am currently on.  Cricket ZTE Engage LT (n8000)
reviews.author: Jimmy Couch

reviews.title: great DOLPHIN BROWSER
reviews.comment: very fast video streaming...  keep it up!!!
reviews.author: John Mariel Sulit

reviews.title: User Rating
reviews.comment: Its fast, you can easily load many tabs, user friendly settings, will load desktop sites only when set and not like other disobedient browsers !
reviews.author: Alisyed kausar

reviews.title: One of the best
reviews.comment: Good browser. Love the add ons and the tab browsing. Gestures are good too. Definitely recommend
reviews.author: Michael McEldowney

reviews.title: Does not really support flash.
reviews.comment: For dudes out there who needs a flash browser, search and install Photon Browser. Its all free. Your Welcome. A good and fast browser and even better since it supports HTML5.
reviews.author: Cyril Blen

reviews.title: Final version?
reviews.comment: Will there be any updates for this?  Or dolphin jetpack is the final version.....  Developers do reply.
reviews.author: Abhinav Mahajan

reviews.title: Best Browser for Android
reviews.comment: I\'ve tried just about every major browser on the android market, but this Dolphin beta version has to be the fastest of all.  This will be my main browser on my mobile device... It makes my budget android phone seem as if it has a faster processor... Excellent browser!!!
reviews.author: Erwin Mirador
